content:
Same question I had for Condition.category, now for Immunization.status: Argonaut page lists "in-progress | on-hold | completed | entered-in-error | stopped" but linked value set lists only "completed | entered-in-error."

What do implementers do with this?

Or is there some official call on which one is correct?
the description needs to be fixed - I better create a warning about that to prompt IG authors to pick up on that - can you create task in gForge to remind me? (thanks)
@Grahame Grieve Can you clarify what you mean. There is a valueset constrained to 2 values. - how can that be fixed?
the short description on the element needs to be fixed because it lists the underlying options
the I'm pretty sure I don't validate that in the IG context (I do in the main publisher)
Oh OK. I should have caught that.
